thread.title: Frontier Names Roy Labrador National Vice President of Channel Partners Program

author: cnbc.com
title: Frontier Names Roy Labrador National Vice President of Channel Partners Program

organizations.name: frontier names roy labrador national vice president of channel partners program

text:
NORWALK, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Frontier Communications Corporation (NASDAQ:FTR) has announced that Roy Labrador, a telecommunications expert with more than 25 years of experience in small, medium, and enterprise sales, has been named National Vice President of its Channel Partners Program.
"Roy brings a wealth of industry experience to this critical role," said Michelle Wolloff, Senior Vice President and General Manager at Frontier. "Investing in, expanding and improving our Channel Partner Program is a top priority for Frontier. Roy's leadership and track record will ensure we continue to drive our commercial sector growth."
Labrador previously served as Vice President, Commercial Sales-Southeast, overseeing the growth and expansion of Frontier’s presence in cloud, unified communications and industry-specific communication and data solutions.
“I am extremely excited about the opportunity to work with master agents throughout the country,” said Labrador. “Frontier Communications has deployed multiple product enhancements and invested in a streamlined and stronger back office to support our master agents. Together, we are ensuring our customers benefit from ever-changing technology needs.”
About Frontier Communications
Frontier Communications Corporation (NASDAQ:FTR) is a leader in providing communications services to urban, suburban, and rural communities in 29 states. Frontier Business™ offers communications solutions to small, medium, and enterprise businesses. More information about Frontier is available at www.frontier.com
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180205005777/en/
Frontier Communications
